snippet: A citizen journalist in Syria who has been instrumental in assisting those covering the conflict in Homs has been seized and perhaps tortured by the Syrian government, an activist told CNN on Saturday.
abstract: A citizen journalist in Syria who has been instrumental in assisting those covering the conflict in Homs has been seized and perhaps tortured by the Syrian government, an activist told CNN on Saturday.

headline.main: Citizen Journalist in Syria Is Captured and Tortured, Activists Say
